title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" option is always present and enabled in the Java popup menus, regardless of the user's preference settings.
EB: The "Build" option should only be enabled when the user has not selected the "Perform build automatically on resource modification" option in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select the "Perform build automatically on resource modification" option.
4. Observe the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective.

Expected: The "Build" option should be disabled in the popup menu.
Actual: The "Build" option is still enabled in the popup menu.
